articles.title: First case of avian influenza A(H5N1) in asymptomatic flock owner in Europe - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Following an outbreak of highly pathogenic avian influenza A(H5N1) in a flock of around 125 Muscovy ducks in a domestic setting in South West England on 22 December 2021, the virus was later also confirmed in the asymptomatic flock owner.

articles.author: Clea Caulcutt, Giorgio Leali, David M. Herszenhorn
articles.title: Macron heads east on risky peacemaker mission - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The French president wants a big breakthrough with Putin ahead of April’s election, but the mission to Moscow could easily backfire.
articles.content: PARIS French President Emmanuel Macron is taking an almighty gamble by styling himself as the world leader who can strike a peace deal with his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin in a meeting on Mond… [+8728 chars]

articles.author: Michiel Willems
articles.title: Mark Zuckerberg and team consider shutting down Facebook and Instagram in Europe if Meta can not process Europeans' data on US servers - City A.M.
articles.description: If Meta is not given the option to transfer, store and process data from its European users on US-based servers, Facebook and Instagram may be shut down
